subject: Swimming
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: After dethroning Michael Phelps at the national championships, a focused Ryan Lochte looks to defeat him again in the 400-meter individual medley at the Pan Pacific Championships.
snippet: After dethroning Michael Phelps at the national championships, a focused Ryan Lochte looks to defeat him again in the 400-meter individual medley at the Pan Pacific Championships.
